pages.text: $(li)The Glowstone is biome composed of mostly by Shimmer and Glowstone.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Nether.$(br)$(li)You can find Brown Mushrooms and Luminous Fungus here.
$(li)Some creatures like Blindsights and Glowsquitos can be found here too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the words $(l)Glowstone Canyon$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
